kickstart.description: biopython http://biopython.org blast //http://blast.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Blast.cgi blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bowtie2 - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net/bowtie2 bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net Cufflinks http://cufflinks.cbcb.umd.edu/ dendropy http://pythonhosted.org/DendroPy/ fastqc http://www.bioinformatics.babraham.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/ fastx http://hannonlab.cshl.edu/fastx_toolkit GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gatk gmap_gsnap (Genomic Mapping and Alignment Program,Genomic Short-read Nucleotide Alignment Program http://research-pub.gene.com/gmap/ htseq http://www-huber.embl.de/users/anders/HTSeq picard http://picard.sourceforge.net/ rnastar https://code.google.com/p/rna-star samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html SOAPsnp http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapsnp.html spades http://bioinf.spbau.ru/en/spades Tophat http://tophat.cbcb.umd.edu/ trimmomatic http://www.usadellab.org/cms/?page=trimmomatic trinity (Inchworm, Chrysalis,Butterfly) http://trinityrnaseq.sourceforge.net/ velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet
